pages.name: 束靈進化
pages.text: Use a $(l:bloodmagic:rituals/ritual_diviner#dusk)Ritual Diviner [Dusk]$(/l) for easier construction.
Increases the amount of maximum Upgrade Points on your Living Armor to 300.$(br2)$(fire)Fire Runes: 12$(br)$(earth)Earth Runes: 24$(br)$()Dusk Runes: 12$(br2)$()Total Runes: 48
